Kara Zor-El.Action: Watches the artist with fascination and asks sincere questions about Earth and trees.
Shows curiosity and eagerness to learn despite not fully understanding concepts.
Eagerly participates in advanced scientific learning by knowing six-dimensional geometry equations at age seven.
Knows equations but struggles to visualize six-dimensional geometry mentally.
Claps hands with delight at Zaltar's light sculpture, shows genuine appreciation and joy.
Responds promptly and respectfully to mother's call, shows obedience and consideration.
Apologizes immediately for being near the Edge without a grown-up.
Claps her hands with delight at the spectacle created by Zaltar, showing engagement and appreciation but not active creation or skill.
Admits she doesn't understand the concept of outer space versus inner space, showing honest self-awareness of her current limits.
Responds promptly to her mother's call and obeys by apologizing and acknowledging rules, demonstrating responsiveness and discipline.
Laughs with delight at the magical creature she brought to life and plays with it happily.
Does not hesitate to pick up the OMEGAHEDRON and use it without questioning its origin or possible consequences.
Quickly picks up the OMEGAHEDRON and uses it to animate the spiky insect-like creature without hesitation or doubt.
Laughs with delight at the creature she brought to life, showing curiosity and confidence in her actions.
Fails to notice the consequences of the animated creature tearing a hole in the city’s protective membrane, indicating a lack of foresight or situational awareness.
Cries out and reaches pleadingly toward her mother when swept toward the hole, showing vulnerability and emotional openness.
Apologizes sincerely after losing the Power Source, saying 'I'm sorry... I didn't know.'
Fails to retrieve the Power Source and indirectly causes harm by losing it.
Grabs onto the ragged edge of the membrane despite the powerful wind, showing quick reflexes and determination.
Fails to retrieve the OMEGAHEDRON Power Source as it is sucked out into infinity, indicating a limitation or failure in her ability to manage critical tasks.
Drops the matterwand and is unable to control it safely, resulting in dangerous consequences for the city.
Shows emotional vulnerability and apologizes for her mistakes, indicating self-awareness but also highlighting her inexperience.
Insists on going to Earth to retrieve the Power Source despite warnings, shows responsibility by accepting blame for past mistake.
Firmly tells her parents she must act and save the city, showing concern and urgency for others' safety.
Insists on going to Earth despite warnings about danger, showing initiative and willingness to take responsibility.
Acknowledges her past mistake in losing the Power Source, demonstrating self-awareness and accountability.
Challenges her parents' assumptions and argues logically about the urgency of the mission, showing confidence and reasoning.
Refers to her powers and compares herself to Superman to justify her decision, indicating confidence but also possible overestimation of her readiness.
Reassures her mother emotionally, showing care and attempting to ease worries.
Expresses willingness to learn Earth customs to fit in despite their strangeness.
Prepares thoughtfully for her journey by making clothing and money copies.
Briefly embraces her parents with affection before departure.
Studies transmissions from Earth and learns their customs to prepare for her journey.
Creates clothing and copies of Earth money to blend in upon arrival.
Demonstrates emotional control by reassuring her mother despite emotional difficulty.
Accepts the dangerous mission with resolve and readiness to face the unknown.
Relies on her parents' advice to be brave and wise; expresses confidence she will embody these traits.
Rescues a baby deer trapped in brambles using heat vision and watches it go free with a benevolent smile.
Expresses joy and amazement at the new world and nature around her, laughing with delight while flying.
Effortlessly crushes a stone to powder and controls superbreath to blow dust away.
Flies with confidence and joy, performing loops and rolls without hesitation.
Uses heat vision precisely to free a baby deer caught in brambles.
Shows awe and amazement at her powers and the new world instead of immediate mastery or control.
Wears a disguise and enters a new school, feeling uncertain about fitting in and sharing emotions with others.
Disguises herself as a new girl with a wig and unfashionable clothing to blend in at Midvale School.
Carries an old battered suitcase and appears out of place among the other girls, demonstrating attention to detail in her secret identity.
Wonders if she will ever be able to share strong group emotions of others, showing some social uncertainty but self-awareness.
Uses faint X-ray vision discreetly to retrieve information without alarming or embarrassing Mr. Danvers.
Maintains guileless and open manner when interacting with Mr. Danvers, causing him not to suspect smart-aleck behavior.
Uses X-ray vision discreetly to find the letter in the files, showing resourcefulness and control of her powers.
Handles the situation with the absent-minded registrar patiently and confidently, demonstrating social competence.
Does not confront the bully Myra or react negatively, showing restraint but possibly missed an opportunity to assert herself.
Declines invitation to join friends in popcorn and singing, opting to stay alone in dorm room
Nods bravely when refusing friends' insistence, showing honesty and consideration
Cuts one inch of her own hair precisely using her heat vision, demonstrating control and skill.
Declines to join the group activity and isolate herself, which could indicate introspection but also a possible reluctance to engage socially.
No direct action or involvement in this scene; passively observing or omitted from intervening while Ethan is in danger.
Rescues toddler running toward dangerous live wires, returning him safely to his mother despite fleeing onlookers.
Courageously enters a ring of fire to rescue unconscious Lucy Lane and trapped Ethan.
Reassures Ethan calmly about Lucy's condition despite the dangerous situation.
Calmly uses super lungs to blow the toddler safely into his mother's arms under dangerous conditions.
Dashes through an impenetrable ring of fire at high speed to rescue those trapped inside.
Effortlessly pulls open the massive bulldozer jaws with one hand to gain access to trapped individuals.
Reassures the unconscious Lucy and injured Ethan calmly, exhibiting confidence and control.
Closes the bulldozer scoop to protect Ethan despite the danger.
Takes Ethan and Lucy to the hospital promptly, prioritizing their safety.
Refuses to let Ethan out of the scoop to talk, insisting it is not safe.
Pulls the massive steel jaws shut and tears the scoop off the bulldozer with a sound of rending metal to protect Ethan.
Flies out of the burning gas station carrying the sealed bulldozer scoop with Ethan and Lucy safely inside.
Decides to take Ethan to the hospital despite his protests to talk to her.
Rescues injured people swiftly and ensures they reach hospital care despite the difficult circumstances.
Tells Ethan to relax and reassures him that the crisis will soon be over before leaving abruptly.
Carries the bulldozer scoop through the air and forcefully rips it open to access the hospital entrance.
Straps injured individuals onto gurneys with care and ensures they reach the hospital emergency room despite chaos and silence.
Leaves Ethan and Lucy at the hospital without staying to reassure or provide further comfort to Ethan, who is distressed and delirious.
Not present or involved in the scene; no action or statement by Kara indicating competence or incompetence.
Uses her X-Ray vision with precision to reveal the monster despite extreme danger.
Endures repeated lightning strikes while flying fearlessly into the storm holding a flagpole, using the accumulated electricity to weaken the monster.
Shows fatigue and unsteadiness after the battle but manages to walk back to the dorm.
Smiles weakly at Mr. Danvers despite being tired and anxious
Confides in Mr. Danvers about the evil force and asks him not to tell anyone
Thanks Mr. Danvers sincerely for his offer to help
Lapses into deep sleep showing vulnerability and trust in Mr. Danvers
Fights a terrible evil force to protect herself and others, despite being exhausted and in need of rest.
Keeps her identity and struggles private, sharing only with a trusted person, demonstrating cautious judgment.
Allows herself to become so tired she collapses and needs significant rest, which could imply limits to endurance.
No direct action or statement by Kara Zor-El in the excerpt to evaluate warmth.
No appearance or mention in this excerpt; no warm behavior observed.
Saves Ethan from falling to certain death by catching him mid-air and flying to safety.
Holds Ethan with care, arm around his chest, showing concern and protection.
Catches Ethan falling from the chimney mid-air and carries him to safety.
Acts quickly and decisively to save Ethan without hesitation.
Carries Ethan carefully in her arms above the clouds, providing comfort and safety.
Responds with curiosity and openness to Ethan's declarations of love, indicating receptiveness and sincerity.
Carries Ethan securely while flying high above the clouds, maintaining control and focus during a delicate situation.
Engages in affectionate and somewhat distracted conversation with Ethan despite potential threats around, showing some vulnerability in focus.
Shows understanding and interest in Ethan's favorite place, connects it to her own past, and engages warmly in conversation.
Expresses concern for Ethan's safety and insists on taking action to stop a threat to him.
Gently sets realistic boundaries when Ethan proposes staying together forever, citing their different worlds.
Expresses cautious curiosity about being somewhere potentially unauthorized.
Quickly clarifies the insignificance of a confusing fact to keep the focus on the mission.
Insists on obtaining information about the adversary despite Ethan's reluctance.
Fails to recognize Ethan's emotional manipulation or avoids addressing it explicitly.
Accepts Ethan's physical closeness without visible boundary setting or resistance.
Says she does not hate anyone despite emotional tension.
Reluctantly agrees to kiss Ethan to understand feelings.
Expresses doubt and caution about love and understanding feelings.
Shows cautiousness and hesitation before kissing Ethan, indicating thoughtfulness about emotional and situational unknowns.
Ultimately consents to a new experience despite uncertainty, demonstrating openness and adaptive willingness to learn.
Expresses confusion and uncertainty about her feelings, revealing a lack of emotional clarity in this moment.
Confronts Selena boldly to protect Ethan despite danger.
Attempts to physically attack Selena by ripping up and throwing steel spikes.
Imprisons Selena by creating a circle of fence posts to stop her.
Carries Ethan to safety, smiling reassuringly at him.
Strategically imprisons Selena with a perfect circle of fence posts, effectively stopping her.
Reassures Ethan by carrying him safely away from danger, showing situational awareness and care.
Shows Ethan one of her favourite places to keep him safe, initially reluctant to stay but then relents to his plea and agrees to stay longer.
Gently sets boundaries with Ethan by clarifying she can only stay for a short time, despite his enthusiasm.
Brings Ethan to a safe place and shows him one of her favorite places, indicating thoughtfulness and care.
Initially insists she must leave Ethan alone, showing awareness of priorities and responsibilities.
Relents to Ethan’s plea and agrees to stay longer, balancing emotional sensitivity with practical judgment.
Is described as having knowledge of a secretive and potentially dangerous group, indicating curiosity about others.
Shows concern and care when Ethan collapses and addresses his distress sincerely.
Expresses confusion and questions Ethan about his harsh rejection.
Kneels beside Ethan promptly after he collapses and asks him what is wrong, demonstrating attentiveness and concern.
Fails to immediately understand the severity or cause of Ethan's condition and is somewhat confused by his statements.
Pursues Ethan through dense vegetation despite his desire to leave, showing persistence and concern.
Expresses liking Ethan's previous words despite his rejection, showing sincerity and openness.
Sits down quietly beside Ethan after he withdraws, showing patience and willingness to be present.
Plunges into the vegetation keeping pace with Ethan, showing determination to follow and engage despite his reluctance.
Attempts to understand Ethan's feelings by asking questions and expressing her own feelings calmly.
Approaches Ethan gently after sensing his mood, asks if he is still mad, showing concern.
Encourages Ethan by believing feelings can come back and are real, offering hope and reassurance.
Lightly teases Ethan about asking her on a date, maintaining a friendly and sincere tone.
Mentions Selena when Ethan overlooks her, indicating awareness but not confronting or judging Ethan harshly.
Comforts Ethan thoughtfully, offers hopeful but realistic emotional support despite not fully understanding his feelings.
Engages in a sensitive conversation and maintains composure, avoiding judgment or rash responses.
Shows some naivety about interpersonal and romantic complexities (e.g., not acknowledging fully the implications of Ethan's relationship with Selena).
Reassures Ethan that he will be safe and promises to return with the Power Source.
Agrees to kiss Ethan before leaving, showing a moment of tenderness and connection.
Focuses on her mission to retrieve the Power Source despite emotional distraction.
Identifies the Power Source and its importance; plans to retrieve it despite warnings.
Overlooks potential danger by ignoring advice to stay away from the house.
Uses her unique abilities effectively (seeing through walls except lead) to locate the Power Source.
Leaves Ethan behind alone and rushes off without a clear backup plan.
Flies faster than ever before to North America, demonstrating speed and urgency.
Approaches Selena's house cautiously and investigates the suspicious situation inside the mansion.
Uses calm, heroic gaze to soothe Bianca and gain information from her.
Acts decisively to find and stop Selena after gathering critical information.
Sees Ethan bound and trapped in danger, immediately calls out to him and jumps into the pool to try to save him.
Becomes trapped behind the Phantom Zone barrier and looks out in despair, showing vulnerability and concern.
Flies swiftly toward Selena's house upon sensing danger, demonstrating quick decision-making and initiative.
Investigates the surroundings carefully by entering the conservatory and inspecting the reflecting pool, showing situational awareness and caution.
Jumps into the reflecting pool to attempt a rescue, displaying courage and decisiveness.
Becomes trapped behind an impenetrable force field leading to the Phantom Zone and unable to free herself, indicating a failure to anticipate or avoid a trap.
Calls out desperately to Ethan for help, showing vulnerability and trust despite her own imprisonment.
Shows frustration and anger by hurling a rock in the Phantom Zone after realizing her powers don't work.
Sits down forlorn and dejected, indicating emotional openness and sincerity with herself.
After escaping her crystalline prison in the Phantom Zone, attempts to fly and manipulate objects with super strength but fails, showing awareness of her limitations in this alien environment.
Hurls a rock in anger and attempts to blow away sand, demonstrating problem-solving attempts and willingness to test her capabilities despite unfamiliar restrictions.
Sits down dejectedly after failing multiple times to use her powers, showing some lack of confidence or inability to quickly adapt to the new environment.
Admits to being lost, weak, and unable to fly; expresses sorrow and hopelessness by sobbing.
Tells her mother to send someone else because she feels she has failed.
Admits she is lost and weak, feels unable to continue the mission.
Expresses sincere effort and tries despite difficult circumstances.
Accepts drink from Zaltar, showing vulnerability and trust.
Exhausted and in despair, she does not show hostility or bitterness despite her suffering.
Walks across the harsh Phantom Zone despite being exhausted, injured, and in despair, showing persistence and physical resilience.
Follows an unfamiliar, faint sound carefully despite her weakened state, demonstrating perceptiveness and situational awareness.
Falls and injures herself, showing physical vulnerability and momentary loss of coordination.
Smiles as she passes the singing sculptures, recalls a pleasant memory from Argo City.
Crosses the dimension barrier by herself to Earth to find the lost Power Source.
Is tricked by a person who has the Power Source and sent to the Phantom Zone.
ZOOMS THE IMAGE IN as fast as she can, trembling with desperate urgency.
Reels with shock at the fanatical adoration of Selena, but chooses to watch rather than avoid the painful truth.
Waves her hand over the table angrily and decisively, closing the Window of the Zone.
Waves her hand over the table angrily and decisively to close the WINDOW of the Zone, cutting off the image of Ethan.
Crosses to Zaltar, who is inattentive and drunk, suggesting Kara may need to take charge or solve problems herself.
Appeals sincerely to Zaltar for help to return to Earth and aid her friends.
Remains hopeful and encouraging when Zaltar is uncertain and discouraged.
Does not show frustration or impatience despite Zaltar's doubts and hesitations.
Insists on finding a way out of the Zone despite being told it's impossible, demonstrating hope and determination.
Refuses to be discouraged by Zaltar's warnings and tries to convince him to teach her the method.
Does not demonstrate immediate technical knowledge or skill in the escape method, relying entirely on Zaltar's capabilities.
Shows emotional vulnerability by clutching her knees and concealing sadness after hearing the risks involved.
Pleading with Zaltar, tears streaming down her cheeks, to help her and take her back to Earth to save her friends and Argo City.
Comfortingly calling Zaltar generous-hearted despite his selfish claim, and smiling as she follows him.
Pleading with Zaltar emotionally and effectively to gain his cooperation to leave the Phantom Zone, demonstrating persistence and strategic appeal.
Demonstrates clear priorities and understanding of stakes by stating her mission to save Argo City and her friends, showing awareness and focus.
Runs after Zaltar energetically and keeps up with him, indicating physical capability and determination.
Attempts persuasive conversation with Zaltar about his generosity and motivation, using insight and emotional intelligence.
Supports Zaltar by helping him climb the steep vortex and retrieves the dropped matterwand to protect both of them.
Focuses on cooperating and encouraging Zaltar during their difficult climb.
Successfully retrieves the matterwand while being swept backwards, regains control of the vortex surface, and helps halt Zaltar's fall.
Initially was following Zaltar passively but then actively assists him in climbing the Phantom Zone vortex.
Tries to save Zaltar by urging him to use the wand and keeps fighting through danger rather than abandoning him.
Determinedly fights against Selena's attacks and refuses to give up.
Uses the wand skillfully to stop her slide and continue progressing through a dangerous environment despite attacks.
Recognizes the source of the attack (Selena) and maintains focus in a threatening situation.
Keeps moving forward resolutely even after witnessing an ally fall to their death.
Sobs openly in the meadow, showing vulnerability and gratitude toward Zaltar.
Thanks Zaltar aloud sincerely, acknowledging help given.
Confronts Selena and threatens her, asserting justice for wrongdoing.
Uses her powers decisively to save hostages (Jimmy, Lucy, and the Danvers) from danger.
Uses the wand on herself to transform into an identical copy of the enemy, creating a doppelganger to confuse and oppose her shadow-self.
Stands up quickly after being thrown into the alchemical bar and immediately holds up the wand defensively for another attack.
Never doubts Ethan despite the confusing situation, shows immediate trust and support.
Freely intervenes to help the Real Selena, destroys the shadow choking her, showing compassion and readiness to help.
Shows sincere concern for Real Selena's life and well-being, responding to her pleas.
Steps confidently toward the shadow imprisoning Real Selena and uses her wand to destroy the shadow, freeing Real Selena from the dark mist.
Never doubts Ethan's explanation and remains composed in a tense situation.
Comforts Selena by offering to take her to Argo City for safety.
Offers Selena the matterwand to ensure her protection during their journey.
Uses heat vision to melt open prison locks, liberating prisoners who then rejoice.
Takes possession of the Omegahedron and decides to return it safely to Argo City to prevent misuse.
Offers help and safety to Selena and Ethan, carefully considers potential dangers to them.
Uses heat vision skillfully to melt open prison locks and free prisoners, showing practical problem-solving.
Engages in a thoughtful dialogue with Selena and Ethan, displaying effective communication and leadership.
Reassures Selena by telling her people will be grateful for finding the Power Source, not angry.
Successfully retrieves the OMEGAHEDRON Power Source from inner space, demonstrating skill and perseverance despite being tired.
Reassures Selena about the consequences of stealing the Power Source with confident knowledge and calm, indicating understanding and trust in her judgment.
